title: Tencent-owned Finnish video game maker Supercell reports 2025 revenue down 4% YoY to €2.65B, EBITA up 6% YoY to €932M, and 290M monthly active players (Sophie McEvoy/GamesIndustry.biz)
tags: GamesIndustry.biz;Tencent-owned Finnish video game maker Supercell reports 2025 revenue down 4% YoY to€2.65B, EBITA up 6% YoY to €932M, and 290M monthly active players
